content.description: Start on a large pocket about 7' off the ground. Make a move to another slopey pocket up and right. Make one more big move to the lip of the boulder and a sloping top out.
content.location: Located on the back side of the boulder with the obvious honeycomb featured rock face, on the opposite side of Metro and Subway.

content.description: Sit start and climb the rightmost diagonal feature through some good pockets to top out near the tallest point of the roof.
content.location: Located on the boulder to the left when facing downhill. When standing on the trail between the two boulders, it is the rightmost of the three diagonal pocketed features on the obvious honeycomb featured rock face. Just right of Subway.

content.description: A fun dirty slab. Start on smeary feet with a finger and a thumb in some pockets. Get higher smeary feet and make a move to the obvious hueco. Either mantel to get high feet or balance to move through the hueco to a slopey topout trending left.
content.location: This problem is on the boulder to your left as you walk off of the underlook trail to motorcycle rocks.

content.description: Sit start and climb the middle diagonal feature through some unique pockets to an easy top out.
content.location: Located on the boulder to the left when facing downhill. When standing on the trail between the two boulders, it is the middle of the three diagonal pocketed features on the obvious honeycomb featured rock face. Just right of Metro.

content.description: Sit start and pull on pockets and edges through the steep face then move onto the arete for a slabby topout.
content.location: Located on the smaller boulder to the right when facing downhill. It is the pocketed face/arete farthest downhill when standing between the two boulders on the trail.

content.description: Sit start and climb the leftmost (uphill) diagonal feature through good pockets to an easy top out.
content.location: Located on the boulder to the left when facing downhill. When standing on the trail between the two boulders, it is the leftmost of the three diagonal pocketed features on the obvious honeycomb featured rock face.

content.description: Sit start below the very left end of the pocketed roof. Climb up and left through pockets and jugs to an easy top out.
content.location: Located on the boulder to the left when facing downhill. When standing on the trail between the two boulders, it is on the leftmost corner of the obvious honeycomb featured rock face.
